taskDescription:
Create an accelerated development timeline for our AI agent team. We need to organize parallel execution tracks for rapid development:
1. Frontend/UI Implementation
2. Backend API Development
3. Database Architecture
4. Security Implementation
5. Testing & QA
workflowContext: We're working with an AI agent team capable of rapid execution. Need to organize parallel workstreams that can be completed in hours rather than weeks. Require efficient task distribution and coordination among team members.

workflowTemplate.name: Custom Workflow - elena
workflowTemplate.description: We're working with an AI agent team capable of rapid execution. Need to organize parallel workstreams that can be completed in hours rather than weeks. Require efficient task distribution and coordination among team members.

agents.taskDescription:
Create an accelerated development timeline for our AI agent team. We need to organize parallel execution tracks for rapid development:
1. Frontend/UI Implementation
2. Backend API Development
3. Database Architecture
4. Security Implementation
5. Testing & QA

coordinationSteps: 1. Initialize workflow and assign tasks to agents
2. Monitor agent progress and task completion
5. Validate success criteria and compile results
successCriteria: All assigned agents respond and acknowledge their tasks
All expected deliverables are provided by agents
No blocking errors or failures in task execution
